title: gifting yo
body: i think yous should allow people to gift champions with ip leave the skins as real money but allow us to gift a champ for ip please

replies.body:
I saw someone offer the idea of gifting champions with IP for double the cost. Honestly not bad but I don't think it'll happen.. I have friends with 100000+ IP and all the champions who just spend it on name changes, so I'd probably get gifted every champion off them.. It wouldn't be too fun/fair really. I like feeling like I really earned something.

Also it would increase botting, since they'd grind IP then use it to champion gift others.
Did your friend buy all the runes? tier 1/2/3
I have all runes and champions. I'm pretty sure you're not allowed to buy runes below tier 3 if you reach level 30.
Nah you still can! There's a drop box in the filter section and you just change it from tier 3 to tier 1 or 2. Although it's not really smart to unless for completionist purposes I guess

He says he's bought a "crap tonne" of runes that he never uses but I don't know if he's got them all. I'll ask next time :)
Atm he just changes his name every week or so and buys the new champs as soon as they come out (..I'm a little jealous.)

It's just easily exploited and that's why it will never be implemented, imagine if someone with loads of IP and nothing to spend it on made a smurf and just gifted all the champs to his smurf. That is alot of money that riot misses out on and it would hurt the profitability of the game.
seems like rito would lose too much money and not get any or enough respect/recognition for it
